rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0001
rows.name:
Here we are, this is my ship.
It's an honor to have you all aboard.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0002
rows.name:
Huh, for an Emperor's ship,
I thought it'd be a lot more gaudy
and gilded.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0003
rows.name: But it's not like that. I like it.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0004
rows.name:
In some countries, the royal flagship
is basically a moving palace.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0005
rows.name:
In Superbia, our national policy is
one of martial valor. Even the Emperor
must be a skilled Driver.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0006
rows.name: So even the royal flagship is a warship.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0007
rows.name: Exactly.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0008
rows.name:
If this weren't an unofficial visit,
my throne would be on the grand
flagship of our entire military.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0009
rows.name:
It's pointless if the general is
the first one to get killed, though.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0010
rows.name: Shin!

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0011
rows.name:
It's okay, Laura.
He's not wrong.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0012
rows.name:
That's why the Emperor is required to
a be worthy Driver for the Empire's 
Jewels, Wadatsumi and Kagutsuchi.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0013
rows.name: As you will.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0014
rows.name:
We will protect Your Majesty's life,
even at the cost of our own.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0015
rows.name: I am counting on you.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0016
rows.name: Messenger! A messenger has arrived!

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0017
rows.name:
His Majesty is entertaining
guests right now.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0018
rows.name:
I must ask you to refrain from
any action that would trouble
the imperial mind.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0019
rows.name: Ah, H-His Majesty... F-forgive me!

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0020
rows.name:
It's alright. It seems to be
an urgent report. May I hear it?

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0021
rows.name: O-of course!

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0022
rows.name:
Due to the one who burned down Torigo,
our recon teams were
on high alert, and...

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0023
rows.name:
they spotted a Gulan boy
near the Seigle Hills camp,
but he ran off...

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0024
rows.name:
Hey, isn't that a survivor
from Torigo Village?

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0025
rows.name:
Yes, that's what we think.
We're about to send out more scouts.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0026
rows.name:
Understood.
Sorry for stopping you.
You're dismissed.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0027
rows.name: Sir! Excuse me!

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0028
rows.name:
Our nation wishes to protect
as many refugees as we can.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0029
rows.name: I hope they find him soon...

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0030
rows.name: Wait! We should go look for him!

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0031
rows.name:
Why?
The army has more manpower to search.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0032
rows.name:
He's a terrified kid from
a burned-out village!
If soldiers show up, he'll just run!

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0033
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]That's certainly true.
Alright, let's go.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0034
rows.name:
Then let's hurry.
We should find him
before he gets too far.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0035
rows.name: Yeah!

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0036
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]What a bunch of softies...
